attributes.action: Shorter School Days for Monday And Tuesday.
attributes.additional_details: To make Children gain more Energy, This would be nice if it went on for 5 weeks.
attributes.background:
Shorten school days by 1 hour
only on Monday and Tuesday.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the length of the school day, but school days vary from school to school, and it's not clear exactly what changes to school days you want schools to be required to make. It's also not clear if you want any requirements to change the length of the school day to be temporary or permanent.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
